data.text: @Oswy47160996 You just keep going out of your way to prove to me and everyone else that you're and ignorant idiot

@DonnaPe56616971 Ah yes you are talking cobblers. Well over 90% of people vaccinated. Every statistic since vaccination got going here has shown unvaccinated have a worse outcome. You lost the argument ages ago, you've only got abuse left. Move on.

@DonnaPe56616971 No " full" approval. What semantic twaddle. Yes the deaths are low because the measures used to control it worked, especially vaccination. Are you against other vaccines for the large number of diseases brought under control by them also?

@Oswy47160996 And no. Covid death rates haven't dropped in Australia at all. Most of the current deaths are vaxed individuals. But you being a typical moron you must think is another conspiracy theory

@Oswy47160996 If you had a brain you would know that none of the so called vaccines have full approval. All are still designated as emergency use experimental drug treatments. Go check for yourself. Only 1% of all Australian deaths in the past 2 years are covid related. Omicron is a weak flu

@DonnaPe56616971 Oh dear the " experimental drug therapy " tripe. What about AZ and the other vaccines? Funny how since most of Australia got vaccinated covid death and hospitalisation rates have plummeted despite restrictions being lifted. I guess I'll just return to the paddock with my mates.

@Oswy47160996 So you don't have a clue. It must be hard for you to comprehend that others aren't complete sheep like you. It's been found that those with higher education or intellect are the ones that resist the experimental drug treatment most. I guess they are rational thinkers & your not

@DonnaPe56616971 I've yet to meet an anti vaxxer yet that doesn't have one about what they believe the Covid vaccine or Covid itself actually is. There are many different ones of course. Perhaps you might surprise me.
